translation.en: [man 1] Hey, Gibson. Come over here, mate.
translation.zh: ‎喂 吉布森 过来 兄弟

translation.en: Whoa. You still lugging that thing around?
[Gibson] Hey, I'm gonna be ready when Zorah Magdaros finally shows itself.
translation.zh:
‎喂 我要时刻准备着
‎等熔山龙现出真身

translation.en: I mean, you really think you're gonna kill a walking volcano monster with that?
translation.zh:
‎我是说 你真的以为自己能用那个
‎杀死一只行走的火山怪物吗？

translation.en: This thing can supposedly level cities with a wag of its tail.
translation.zh:
‎据说那个怪物摇一摇尾巴
‎就能夷平城市

translation.en: Gibson, if half the rumors are true,
translation.zh: ‎吉布森 如果流言有一半是真的

translation.en: you may wanna count yourself lucky that it hasn't shown itself yet.
translation.zh:
‎那它至今还没有现出真身 ‎-‎你应该觉得自己走运
‎-拜托

translation.en: -We're the Fifth Fleet. Best of the best! -[laughs] I'll drink to that!
translation.zh:
‎-我们可是第五期团 人中龙凤！
‎-我敬你这句话！

translation.en: Zorah Magdaros had better keep its head underwater
translation.zh: ‎熔山龙最好还是把头埋在水下

translation.en: because no one's met the monster that can handle Hunters like us.
translation.zh:
‎因为没有哪个怪物
‎能对付像我们这样的猎人

translation.en: -[man 1 laughs] -[man 2] I have.
-[heroic orchestral music playing] -I faced an Elder Dragon.
You have no idea what we're up against.
translation.zh: ‎你们根本不知道我们面对的是什么

translation.en: [groans] Come on!
Whoa! Aw, come on.
Lucky catch.
Enjoy your breakfast!
Morning, Mrs. Bellflower.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 贝尔弗劳尔太太

translation.en: Morning, Aiden. You're out early.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 艾登 你出来得挺早啊

translation.en: You know what they say. "The early Kut-Ku catches the Konchu."
translation.zh:
‎你知道古人说的
‎“早起的翼龙有盾虫吃”

translation.en: [Bellflower] I did not know they said that. You and your monsters.
translation.zh:
‎不 我不知道古人说过这个
‎是你自己瞎说的吧

translation.en: [chuckles] Nice-lookin' catch, Aiden.
How about a Gastronome Tuna for some Poogie Jammies?
translation.zh:
‎用贪吃鲔鱼
‎喂一些睡衣噗吱猪怎么样？

translation.en: [man 1] Not gonna happen!
-Watch where you're going, Loke. -[man 2] Whoa! Nice move, Aiden.
translation.zh:
‎-小心看路 洛克
‎-躲得好 艾登

translation.en: -You must be practicing. -[Aiden] You better believe it.
translation.zh:
‎-你一定是在练习身法
‎-那你最好相信

translation.en: Thanks again for clearing out those Bnahabra.
translation.zh: ‎再次感谢你帮我清理那些飞甲虫

translation.en: Hopefully, these patches'll keep 'em out for good.
translation.zh: ‎希望这些补丁能把它们永远挡在门外

translation.en: [Aiden] Always "Bna-happy" to help.
[man 3] Hey, have you seen Farmer Burl?
translation.zh: ‎喂 你有没有看到伯尔农夫？

translation.en: Ooh! Ebbi's been waiting for you there all morning.
[Ebbi] Something's gotten in Farmer Burl's coops.
translation.zh: ‎伯尔农夫的笼子好像抓到了点什么

translation.en: -Come on. We gotta go. It's a real quest! -[Aiden grunts]
translation.zh:
‎走吧 我们得走了
‎真的是个大任务！

translation.en: What if it's Rathalos?
Did you know that Rathalos have poisonous claws? [growls]
-Yeah? -One scratch, and you're a goner.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-碰你一下 你就完了

translation.en: [chuckles] I kinda doubt a Rathalos got into Farmer Burl's Gargwa coops.
translation.zh:
‎我其实怀疑火龙是否能进入
‎伯尔农夫的丸鸟笼子

translation.en: I'd bring some antidotes anyway.
translation.zh: ‎不管怎么说 我会带上些解药

translation.en: Yes.
Mrs. Genovan, look.
[Genovan] Is that my cast-iron skillet?
Just finished putting the new fence in last week, and now look at it.
translation.zh: ‎上周刚把新栅栏装好 但你现在看看

translation.en: Tracks.
Velociprey, I think.
Can you take care of it?
Mr. Burl, you called the "Right-noplos" guy for the job.
translation.zh:
‎伯尔先生 你叫来了“赢甲龙”
‎来处理这件事

translation.en: Because Rhenoplos, it's a…
With the horn? Never mind.
translation.zh:
‎鼻子上有角？
‎算了 不用管我说什么

translation.en: [sniffs] It's fresh.
That's no Velociprey.
Come on!
[softly] Yes!
[chuckles softly] That… That was close.
You're fortunate the Velocidrome was alone.
translation.zh: ‎你要庆幸这只蓝速龙王只有自己一个

translation.en: They usually hunt with a pack of Velociprey.
Yikes. The tracks I was following were a Velociprey's.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我追寻的足迹是蓝速龙留下的

translation.en: Didn't think I'd be running into its big brother.
translation.zh: ‎真没想到我会遇到蓝速龙王

translation.en: Are you a Hunter?
You are, aren't you?
Like, a real Guild Hunter.
translation.zh: ‎就是那种 真正的公会猎人

translation.en: The last time one came through Timben, I was, like, nine years old.
translation.zh:
‎上次有猎人来到汀本
‎还是我大概九岁的时候

translation.en: This is so cool. I'm a Hunter too.
I mean, well, I've never actually hunted something that can hunt back before, but…
translation.zh:
‎我的意思是 我以前从来没有捕猎过
‎可以反击的东西 但是…

translation.en: -I'm Aiden, by the way. -My name is Julius.
translation.zh:
‎-对了 我叫艾登
‎-我叫朱利乌斯

translation.en: You shouldn't be hunting without a license from the Hunter's Guild.
translation.zh:
‎你不应该在
‎没有猎人公会认证的情况下捕猎

translation.en: -It's poaching. -[Aiden] I… Well…
One of them Velociprey…
What are you doing?
One does not take a monster's life lightly.
translation.zh: ‎任何人都不能轻视怪物的生命

translation.en: To do so would betray the balance of nature.
translation.zh: ‎如果轻视 那会破坏自然的平衡

translation.en: A Hunter has an obligation to see its sacrifice does not go to waste.
translation.zh:
‎猎人有义务保证怪物的牺牲
‎不会白白浪费

translation.en: Now, this village you're from, it's nearby?
translation.zh: ‎你来自的那个村庄离这儿近吗？

translation.en: I'm not in trouble, am I?
I mean, you killed it, right? So…
translation.zh: ‎我是说 是你杀的它 对吧？所以…

translation.en: Here's the thing. The last time one of the villagers
translation.zh: ‎是这样的 上一次有一个村民

translation.en: got an Altaroth infestation in their basement,
translation.zh: ‎在他们的地下室受到了甲虫的侵扰

translation.en: Mitul had to walk all the way to Dundorma.
translation.zh: ‎米图尔不得不一路走到特德尔求助

translation.en: It took two weeks!
And then, when we finally met with the Hunter's Guild,
translation.zh:
‎然后 当我们终于见到
‎猎人公会的人时

translation.en: they'd never even heard of our village before.
translation.zh: ‎他们甚至从来没听说过我们村庄

translation.en: There's no way we can go for help every time a Kelbi
translation.zh:
‎那不可能每一次
‎精灵鹿闯入棍棒洋葱地

translation.en: gets into the Cudgel Onion patch.
Ah. So you take it upon yourself to sort things out.
translation.zh: ‎那你就自己一个人解决这种问题

translation.en: I'm actually pretty good at this stuff.
translation.zh: ‎其实我很擅长解决这种问题

translation.en: Are these the Velociprey tracks you were following?
translation.zh: ‎这些是你追寻的蓝速龙足迹吗？

translation.en: Yep. Those are them. Somebody's still gotta deal with that.
translation.zh: ‎是的 就是这些 总得有人去解决问题

translation.en: These are fake.
What?
And from the looks of it,
you have a Melynx to thank for all your troubles.
translation.zh:
‎你遇到的这些麻烦
‎都是拜梅拉露所赐

translation.en: Oh. When I find him, I'm gonna--
translation.zh:
‎你遇到的这些麻烦
‎都是拜梅拉露所赐 ‎要是让我找到它 我一定…

translation.en: Aiden, later. The village first.
translation.zh: ‎艾登 迟点吧 回村庄要紧

translation.en: But… [scoffs] This isn't over.
[Julius] Is there someone who makes decisions for the village?
[Aiden] Elder Daazel. She's a Wyverian.
Lived here longer than there's been a village.
translation.zh:
‎她住在这里的时间
‎比村庄出现的时间还久

translation.en: She's in the building with Huskberry bushes out front.
translation.zh:
‎她住在那幢
‎前面长着浆果灌木丛的房子里

translation.en: -I can show you where it is. -[Julius] I'll find my way. Take this.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以告诉你在哪儿
‎-我能自己找到 你拿着这个

translation.en: -[Aiden grunts] -[Ebbi] Holy moly!
Keep an eye on that for me, would you, Ebbi?
translation.zh: ‎帮我看着它 好吧 埃比？

translation.en: I'll be back shortly.
Give it a rest, Feathers. I'm not quite ready for you yet.
translation.zh:
‎安静会儿 长羽毛的家伙们
‎我还没有给你们准备好

translation.en: Mm! A little Felvine for flavor.
Don't you move. You're gonna pay for what you've done.
translation.zh: ‎别动 你要为你所做的付出代价

translation.en: Why, certainly, good sir. Uh, how much do I owe you?
translation.zh:
‎怎么了？当然 善良的先生
‎我欠你多少钱？

translation.en: You're a… Wait, you can talk?
I thought wild Melynx only spoke Melynx or whatever.
translation.zh:
‎我以为野生梅拉露
‎只会说梅拉露语或是…

translation.en: "Meowst" do, uh, that's true. But I'm not as wild as some.
translation.zh:
‎“梅有错” 大部分是那样的
‎但我不像有些那么野

translation.en: I'm a merchant.
Nox is the name.
Really? Then what are you doing with Farmer Burl's--? [yelps]
translation.zh: ‎真的？那你对伯尔农夫做了什么？

translation.en: Why, you-- Ow!
-Hey! [yelps] -[Aiden grunting]
Oh my--
Yeah, just put that anywhere.
Just don't hit the--
Oh! Come on!
-That is precious cargo. -[Aiden grunts] Ow!
That was a limited-edition pot!
-What kind of-- Oh, real nice. -[Aiden continues grunting]
You "meowster"!
Come back here, you furry little felon!
translation.zh: ‎给我回来 你个长毛的小恶棍！

translation.en: I don't suppose I could interest you in an array of secondhand commodities?
translation.zh: ‎我还真不知道 ‎这一堆上好的二手货也能吸引你？

translation.en: [Nox, muffled] All right, 15, uh, 20%, but that is the best I can do.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 给你15-20%的折扣
‎这是我能接受的最大程度

translation.en: For the last time, I'm not interested in your Zenny.
translation.zh: ‎最后说一次 我对你的钱并不感兴趣

translation.en: "Your Zenny." Listen to me, buying into this Bullfango.
translation.zh: ‎“你的钱” 你听我说 野猪都不会信你

translation.en: -[Nox groans] Unnecessary. -[sighs] You're a thief.
I'm a Hunter, and bringing you in is gonna prove to that Guild know-it-all
translation.zh:
‎而我是猎人 把你抓起来
‎是为了向那个万事通公会证明

translation.en: that I can protect my village.
[Nox] Oh, I get it. You're a protector.
translation.zh: ‎我明白了 你是个守护者

translation.en: -You protect. -That's right.
[Nox] Hear me out.
How much more effective would you be as a protector
translation.zh: ‎如果你能用自己的飞艇守护他们

translation.en: if you could just protect them with your very own airship?
translation.zh:
‎那你能成为一个
‎多么有效率的守护者呀？

translation.en: Now, I… I know a guy…
[Burl] Hi.
Well, Mr. Burl, I've solved your problem.
translation.zh: ‎伯尔先生 我已经解决了你的问题

translation.en: I think you'll be pleased to have these back.
translation.zh: ‎我想你一定很开心能找回这些

translation.en: -My Gargwa! -[chuckles] Nice, Aiden.
Heck of a good job, son.
-[Nox groans, coughs] -And the thief responsible.
Uh, hello.
[villager] Yeah, Aiden!
Still think I shouldn't be hunting? -Yes. -[Julius grunts]
translation.zh:
‎-你还认为我不应该捕猎吗？
‎-是的

translation.en: -[Nox] Oof. -What's all this?
I was just explaining
that your village lies in the path of an Elder Dragon.
translation.zh: ‎你们的村庄在古龙种的迁徙路线上

translation.en: What?
What does that mean?
Nothing good.
The Elder Dragons are the most ancient
and powerful of monster kind.
Once enraged, incredible energy flows from them,
translation.zh: ‎一旦发怒 ‎它们会释放巨大的能量

translation.en: warping ecosystems in the places where they live.
translation.zh: ‎甚至扭曲它们栖息之处的生态系统

translation.en: [Julius] For the most part, these creatures remain in one place.
translation.zh:
‎大多数情况下 这些生物
‎只待在一个地方

translation.en: However, during the periodic migration,
called the Elder Crossing, they migrate across the continent
translation.zh: ‎周期性迁徙中 它们横跨大陆

translation.en: and over the great ocean,
leaving a path of destruction in their wake.
Based on our reports, we now believe they are all headed to the same location
translation.zh:
‎据我们的报告显示
‎我们认为它们都在前往海对面的

translation.en: over the sea, but we don't know why.
translation.zh: ‎同一个地点 但我们并不清楚原因

translation.en: [Daazel] For most of recorded history,
translation.zh: ‎在大部分文字可考的历史中

translation.en: these events were extraordinarily rare.
-[people scream] -[Daazel] One in a century was uncommon.
It's now happening once every decade.
translation.zh: ‎但现在每十年就会发生一次

translation.en: [Julius] Ten years ago, the Guild summoned Hunters to Port Tanzia to join a Fleet.
translation.zh:
‎十年前 公会召集猎人到塔吉亚港
‎组成一支期团

translation.en: Their mission?
To find the cause of the more frequent migrations.
Hunters, like myself,
have been dispatched by the Hunter's Guild to search for signs of the next migration.
translation.zh:
‎被猎人公会派去寻找
‎下一次迁徙的征兆

translation.en: I am here to tell you
an Elder Dragon is on its migration path,
translation.zh: ‎有一只古龙种正在按照迁徙路线活动

translation.en: straight for your village.
Holy moly.
You must evacuate now.
Wait a minute. You expect us to just pack up and leave?
translation.zh:
‎等等 你是希望我们
‎收拾行李离开这里？

translation.en: How do we know any of this is even true?
translation.zh: ‎我们怎么知道你说的是不是真的？

translation.en: -We don't know you. -I agree. What about our homes?
translation.zh:
‎-我们不认识你
‎-我同意 那我们的房子怎么办？

translation.en: -Did you think of that? -Homes? Homes can be rebuilt.
translation.zh:
‎-你考虑过吗？
‎-家？家可以重新建

translation.en: We're talking about lives here. We should do as he says.
translation.zh:
‎这可是性命攸关的大事
‎我们应该按他说的去做

translation.en: Some of us can't carry our livelihood with us, Navid. I don't trust this man.
translation.zh:
‎有些人没办法把维持生计的东西带上
‎纳威德 我不相信这个男人

translation.en: No, I don't either. I mean, why should we listen to him?
translation.zh:
‎我也不相信 我是说
‎我们为什么要听他的？

translation.en: It's true.
This valley is acting like a funnel for monsters fleeing the Elder Dragon.
translation.zh:
‎整个山谷像一个漏斗一样
‎怪物们都在逃离古龙种

translation.en: -Most likely-- -Most likely?
He's just guessing!
I believe him.
He saved my life.
Aiden, he's not from our village.
translation.zh: ‎艾登 他不是我们村庄的人

translation.en: What if I go up there and see this for myself?
translation.zh: ‎那如果我亲自去那里看看情况呢？

translation.en: Well, if you tell us the danger is real, I will believe you.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 如果是你告诉我们危险是真的
‎我就相信

translation.en: Okay. I will too.
Then you will evacuate?
We have to know.
Take me there.
The Elder Dragon will pass through the valley within a week.
translation.zh: ‎古龙种会在一周之内经过山谷

translation.en: I will take the boy
to see with his own eyes the coming danger,
translation.zh: ‎让他亲眼看看即将来临的危险

translation.en: but there can be no delay in your preparations.
translation.zh: ‎但你们必须现在就做好准备工作

translation.en: You must be ready to leave as soon as he returns.
translation.zh: ‎等他一回来就可以准备好立刻撤离

translation.en: We will begin at first light.
[Burl] This doesn't sound good.
What are you going to do?
-[Nox yowls] -Now, what to do with you?
I may have use for him.
-Have you hunted Zinogre? -[Julius] Yes.
-Diablos? -Yes.
Aiden, no!
I had that one.
These monsters are no threat.
They're fleeing the Elder Dragon.
There's something I don't get. How come the Guild gets to decide
translation.zh: ‎我有点没理解 公会是怎么决定的

translation.en: when and what people can hunt?
translation.zh: ‎人什么时候可以捕猎什么呢？

translation.en: A dead monster's a dead monster, isn't it?
translation.zh: ‎死掉的怪物就是死掉的 不是吗？

translation.en: Most people once agreed with you.
translation.zh: ‎曾经大部分人都同意你的观点

translation.en: Ages ago, we hunted monsters indiscriminately
translation.zh:
‎很久以前
‎我们不加以区分地捕猎怪物

translation.en: to the point where the natural balance of life was disrupted.
translation.zh: ‎以至于生命的自然平衡被破坏了

translation.en: The effect on our environment was devastating.
translation.zh: ‎对我们环境的影响也是毁灭性的

translation.en: It is this very reason that the Hunter's Guild was formed.
translation.zh: ‎这就是猎人公会成立的原因

translation.en: Our balance with nature is more delicate than you think.
translation.zh:
‎我们与大自然的平衡比你想象中
‎要微妙得多

translation.en: [Julius] Dual Blades.
They work separately, but always together.
translation.zh: ‎它们分开使用 但总相伴左右

translation.en: Always on the offensive.
Overwhelming and outnumbering one's opponent like two unrelenting foes.
translation.zh:
‎在能力和数量上都超过敌人
‎就像两个无情的对手

translation.en: The motion is fluid and precise,
like the flow of a stream.
-May I? -Here. Try these first.
translation.zh:
‎-我能试试吗？
‎-给 先试试这两个

translation.en: Concentrate on your center. You need a stable foundation.
translation.zh:
‎集中在你的核心
‎你需要一个稳定的根基

translation.en: Don't worry.
We may make a decent Hunter of you yet.
translation.zh:
‎我们也许以后
‎能让你成为一个称职的猎手

translation.en: [Nox panting] Hey. Hey, guys. Wait.
Isn't this distribution of baggage just a little unfair?
translation.zh: ‎这样的行李分配是不是有点不公平？

translation.en: [sighing] Oh God.
Nice armor.
[laughs] You noticed. It's 100% iron ore.
translation.zh:
‎你注意到了
‎这是百分之百铁矿石制的

translation.en: Velocidrome-tested. Works as a weapon. Got good balance.
translation.zh:
‎蓝速龙王检测过的 ‎使用起来像武器一样
‎有很好的平衡性

translation.en: Campfire cookware.
Perhaps you need to look the part.
translation.zh: ‎可能你应该有一套适合你身份的装束

translation.en: This could fit.
[gasps, chuckles] Thank you.
[Julius] It is Guild-issue.
-Come here. -[Julius] Aiden.
Come on. Bring it in.
Um, no. No, Aiden.
It's okay. Don't… Don't touch me.
In case you were wondering… [yawns]
…there's nowhere you can run that I won't be able to track you, Nox.
translation.zh:
‎不管你跑到哪里
‎我都能找到你 诺克斯

translation.en: [gasps] Say what? Uh-oh. No. No.
-[rustling] -[Julius] Mm-hmm. And get out of my bag.
[Nox] Who, me? I'm not. I'm right over here.
translation.zh: ‎谁 我？我没有 我就在这里来着

translation.en: What?
I don't see anything.
[Julius] Quiet.
Run!
[Aiden] Nox!
Aiden, no!
Come on!
Climb up here!
That was the scariest thing I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎这是我见过的最可怕的事情

translation.en: It can't get any worse than that. [chuckles]
Aiden, come up here.
[Aiden grunts] What's that smell?
I was incorrect. It's… -Uh, yeah, it's worse. -[thunder rumbles]
[Aiden] Holy moly.
[gasps] What is that?
That is what you face.
An Elder Dragon.
An unbridled force of nature given flesh,
translation.zh: ‎一种不受约束的自然力量的化身

translation.en: headed directly for your village.
Aiden, you have, at most, three days until your village is destroyed.
translation.zh:
‎艾登 你最多还有三天的时间
‎否则你们的村庄就会被摧毁

translation.en: That's an Elder Dragon?
I've tracked it for almost a month. Your people must leave the valley at once.
translation.zh:
‎我已经追寻它一个月了 你们的村民
‎必须赶快离开村庄

translation.en: We'll never make it. The only way out is through the Everwood.
translation.zh: ‎我们回不去 除非穿过长青林

translation.en: -We'd run right into it. -Then you must go west.
translation.zh:
‎-我们必须马上进去
‎-那你们就要往西走

translation.en: The Western Ridge is unpassable.
It would take two weeks to get out of the Elder Dragon's path.
translation.zh:
‎要大概两周才能逃离
‎古龙种的迁徙路线

translation.en: -What about the Guild? -They're too far away.
You said so yourself.
Aiden, you've seen the danger.
Convince your people to go west, and you may still save some of them.
translation.zh:
‎说服你的村民往西走
‎你还能救下来一部分村民

translation.en: Remain in the valley, and you will lose everyone.
translation.zh: ‎待在村庄只会让所有人都丧命

translation.en: Wait, where are you going?
It is my mission to warn every village from here to the ocean to evacuate.
translation.zh:
‎我的任务是警告从这里
‎到海洋地区的每一个村庄赶快撤离

translation.en: Not just yours.
So, that's it?
You're just gonna walk away?
Well, what if we fight it?
What if we can somehow change its course so it doesn't destroy all those villages?
translation.zh:
‎如果我们能改变它的路线
‎让它不会摧毁所有的村庄呢？

translation.en: We're Hunters.
We have to do something!
An Elder Dragon is not just another monster.
And you are not a Hunter.
Maybe not. Maybe I've been kidding myself,
translation.zh:
‎也许不是吧
‎也许我一直在跟自己开玩笑

translation.en: but at least I know what it means to be a monster Hunter.
translation.zh:
‎但至少我知道
‎成为一个猎人意味着什么

translation.en: I'm not gonna turn my back on Elder Daazel, Burl,
translation.zh: ‎我不会不管达泽尔长老、伯尔

translation.en: Genovan, Mitul, or Ebbi.
I'll fight with sticks if I have to!
translation.zh: ‎即使是用木棍 我也会抗争到底

translation.en: [sighs] I bring him out here,
and he becomes even more determined to stay.
"Care for nature, and it will deliver prosperity."
translation.zh: ‎“爱护自然 自然就会带来繁荣”

translation.en: "Build from prosperity to craft a thriving community."
translation.zh: ‎“繁荣可以建设一个欣欣向荣的群体”

translation.en: "Live harmoniously in that community
and teach it to always care for nature."
The cycle of balance?
Isn't that what you swore to protect?
translation.zh: ‎这不是你们发誓要保护的吗？

translation.en: That Elder Dragon is destroying nature, and it's about to destroy community.
translation.zh:
‎古龙种在摧毁自然
‎现在还要摧毁那些群体

translation.en: If you leave, you're not just abandoning us.
translation.zh: ‎如果你离开 你不仅是抛弃了我们

translation.en: You're turning your back on what it means to be a Hunter.
translation.zh: ‎你还违背了成为猎人的要义

translation.en: Where did you learn that?
This journal belongs to a Hunter.
Anyone within range will find us.
translation.zh: ‎任何在射程内的人都会找到我们

translation.en: If we're going to do this, we're going to need some help.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们要抗争
‎那我们就需要一些帮助

translation.en: Yes! It is "Alatre-on"!
[Julius] The last entry here is only two days old.
translation.zh: ‎这里最后两条是两天前写的

translation.en: -Where did you get it? -I found it in Nox's loot.
translation.zh:
‎-你从哪儿拿到的日记？
‎-从诺克斯的二手货里找到的

translation.en: Who did you steal this from?
"Purr-cured" it, please.
translation.zh: ‎是想办法弄到的 好不好

translation.en: Easy on the s-word.
Uh, the thing is, uh, my memory's a little foggy, so…
-Find the owner, and you go free. -[clicks tongue] Right this way.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想到日记的主人 你就自由了 ‎这边请

translation.en: [Nox] This is "purr-ty" close to where I found the Hunter.
translation.zh: ‎这里非常接近我发现猎人的地方了

translation.en: She was camped here for the night.
You guys smell that?
This way. And careful.
The creature she's hunting is extremely dangerous.
Buddy, if we run into trouble, plan A is run away.
translation.zh: ‎朋友 如果我们遇到危险 逃跑是上策

translation.en: Plans C, D, and E are hide,
negotiate, and run away.
There is no plan boomerang.
-[screams] -[grunts] Get out of the way!
-Hey, ugly! Over here. -[Kinsect buzzes]
[Hunter] Let's see what you got.
You're a lot faster than that last one.
This is high.
Paisley!
[Aiden] Don't worry!
We are here to he-- [groans]
Ugh. Amateurs.
-[Nox] They're not coming this way. -[screams]
[yelps] Oh! No, no, no, no!
[in slow-motion] Oh no!
Can't believe I'm doing this.
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信我竟然做这种事

translation.en: [Aiden] Help!
I got you, man. You're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: ‎我抓住你了 兄弟 你会没事的

translation.en: -[Nox and Aiden screaming] -[Hunter] Seriously?
Okay, big guy. Let's see how well you fight.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 大家伙 ‎让我们看看你身手有多好

translation.en: -Ha! You are a nasty one, aren't ya? -[Nerscylla growls]
translation.zh: ‎你真是个难缠的家伙 对吧？

translation.en: -[Julius grunts] -[Aiden] Julius!
[Nox] We'll be perfectly safe now.
-[yelps, groans] -[Aiden] Nox!
-[Julius grunting] -[Aiden] Julius! Watch out!
[Aiden] Whoa! No!
-[Aiden] Hey! I'm still up here! -Time for plan boomerang.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我还在上面呢！ ‎该回旋镖的策略登场了

translation.en: No, no, no! No plan boomerang!
Sure, he gives me the weapon that comes flying back at your face.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 他给我的武器
‎只会飞回来打我自己的脸

translation.en: Give him a big kiss for us.
-[Aiden] No. Shoo. Go away. No. -[Paisley buzzing]
I'm back in this.
I'm gonna flank him! [grunts]
I got a little problem here!
[grunting] Julius, I think I'm stuck, stuck in the gooey stuff.
translation.zh: ‎朱利乌斯 我好像被困住了 ‎有黏黏的东西困住了我

translation.en: [groans] Hurry, hurry, hurry, hurry. He's coming.
He's gonna eat me. Hurry!
Watch out!
[groans] That… was so cool! That was so cool! Did you see?
Guys, I can't hold this little fella all day.
translation.zh: ‎各位 我可不能整天救这个小家伙

translation.en: Oh man. I was up in the tree, and then I swung back. I…
translation.zh:
‎天啊 我当时被挂在树上
‎然后重回战场

translation.en: I got a few hits in, and then…
Thanks a bunch, you guys. I only needed another few minutes
translation.zh:
‎真是谢谢你们
‎以至于我还多用了几分钟

translation.en: to ascertain its bite strength and leaping ability.
translation.zh: ‎来确定它的咬合力和跳跃能力

translation.en: And those swords, they're gonna throw the data way off.
translation.zh:
‎那些剑只会让我
‎无法拿到需要的数据

translation.en: -[Julius] You slayed it. -Your partner was in big trouble.
translation.zh:
‎-你杀了它
‎-你的搭档有大麻烦

translation.en: And he's lucky this was a juvenile.
translation.zh: ‎他应该庆幸这只是年幼的怪物

translation.en: I would expect an Ace Hunter to recognize when someone doesn't need help.
translation.zh:
‎我希望首席猎人能意识到
‎什么时候别人不需要帮助

translation.en: Ace Hunter?
-[Julius grunts] -Yeah, him.
-You, not so much. -Hey.
Nice work, geniuses. [sighs]
Of course, nobody else takes the time to… [grunts] …obtain proper monster data.
translation.zh:
‎当然 没有人会花时间
‎去获取正确的怪物数据

translation.en: Just leave it to Mae to do all the legwork,
translation.zh: ‎把所有的跑腿工作都留给梅来做

translation.en: then mess it up when she's almost done. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎然后在她即将完成的时候全都搞砸

translation.en: Here I was, thinking I was the only one following up on these reports.
translation.zh:
‎我来到这里 以为我是唯一一个
‎跟进报告的人

translation.en: No? Uh, why are you even here then?
-You're Mae, I'm guessing. -Oh! My journal. Oh! My notes. Oh! [kisses] Oh my gosh.
translation.zh:
‎-我猜你就是梅
‎-我的日记 我的笔记 天啊

translation.en: -I thought I'd lost you. -[chuckles] We found it.
translation.zh:
‎-我以为我丢了你
‎-我们找到的

translation.en: Uh, I mean, well, we found Nox, and he sto--
translation.zh:
‎我的意思是 我们发现了诺克斯
‎是它偷…

translation.en: Hey, so, uh, should we be concerned about that?
translation.zh: ‎喂 所以我们应该关注一下那个吗？

translation.en: -I'm up here! -[shot rings out]
Took me a while to pick up your trail after I saw the flare.
translation.zh:
‎看到信号后
‎我花了好久才找到你的踪迹

translation.en: Sorry I missed the party.
-Nadia. -Julius.
Two Ace Hunters.
-Today must be my lucky day or something. -You two know each other?
translation.zh:
‎-今天一定是我的幸运日什么的
‎-你们两个认识吗？

translation.en: They assigned me the region just south of here.
translation.zh: ‎公会把我分配到这里南边一点的位置

translation.en: I spotted the smoke on the horizon.
It's headed right into this valley.
It's a Lunastra, a big one.
translation.zh: ‎是一只炎妃龙 很大的一只

translation.en: -You've seen it? -Lunastra?
-As in, an Elder Dragon Lunastra? -[Julius groans] Uh… Ah…
And you got close to it? What kind of a wingspan did it have?
translation.zh:
‎你接近它了吗？
‎它的翼展是什么样的？

translation.en: Was its mane more cobalt blue or closer to periwinkle?
translation.zh:
‎它的鬃毛是钴蓝色
‎还是更接近长春花颜色？

translation.en: [Nadia] Why the flare? Seems like you guys had this one under control. Wait.
translation.zh:
‎所以为什么发信号？
‎看起来你们已经打败这只了 等等

translation.en: No. You're actually going to fight it?
translation.zh: ‎不是吧 你不会想和它对抗吧？

translation.en: -We could use your help. -Are you kidding?
translation.zh:
‎-我们需要你的帮助
‎-你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: No one's done a comprehensive assessment of a Lunastra before.
translation.zh: ‎还没有人对炎妃龙 ‎做过全面评估

translation.en: You know what we're asking.
[chuckles] If that time with the Ludroth is any indication,
translation.zh: ‎如果水生兽那次经历有什么启示的话

translation.en: you do a lot better with me watching your back.
translation.zh:
‎那就是有我在后面保护你
‎你会更加厉害

translation.en: "Gargw-awesome."
-What the--? -Uh, he does that.
Hey, uh, I… I don't think that guy can breathe in there.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我觉得那个人可能快不能呼吸了

translation.en: Where… Where is that thing?
Did… Did you kill it?
Oh, thank you. You saved my life.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们 你们救了我的命

translation.en: That thing destroyed my whole caravan.
translation.zh: ‎那个怪物摧毁了我整个大篷车

translation.en: You really want to take on an Elder Dragon,
we're gonna need a lot more than armor repairs.
translation.zh: ‎那我们需要的可不止是修复盔甲

translation.en: We're gonna need weapons.
Big weapons.
Uh, actually, I was trading with a smithy not far from here.
translation.zh:
‎事实上 我在和离这儿不远的
‎一家铁匠铺做生意

translation.en: Name of Ravi.
I can show you where to find him,
translation.zh:
‎我可以带你们去找他
‎但我提前警告你们…

translation.en: but I should warn you, he is not very fond of visitors.
translation.zh:
‎我可以带你们去找他
‎但我提前警告你们… ‎他不太喜欢来访者

translation.en: -[tools clanging] -[Nox laughs] What? Oh yeah.
I'm sure this guy gets lots of customers every day.
translation.zh: ‎我确定这人每天有很多顾客

translation.en: Yeah.
-[bright orchestral music playing] -Uh, excuse me.
Whatever your business, take it elsewhere.
translation.zh: ‎不管你来做什么 去别处吧

translation.en: Uh, please. There's an Elder Dragon coming.
-We're trying to stop it. -[steam hisses]
We need some…
If you'd just forge some equipment for us, it can make a big difference.
translation.zh:
‎你只需为我们锻造一些武器
‎那就会有很大的改变

translation.en: I don't forge weapons.
You'll die too!
This Elder Dragon you're so eager to confront,
translation.zh: ‎这个你如此渴望对抗的古龙种

translation.en: its life can't be measured
by human understanding.
It has existed for ages
and will continue to exist long after we're gone.
translation.zh: ‎而且我们死后 它也会继续存活下去

translation.en: Compared to that, our lives are small, meaningless things.
translation.zh:
‎相比之下 我们的生命
‎是渺小、毫无意义的

translation.en: Maybe your life has been meaningless, but mine won't be.
translation.zh: ‎可能你的人生毫无意义 但我的不会

translation.en: Aiden, go.
[Ravi] You, Hunter.
Did you forget how dangerous an Elder Dragon is?
translation.zh: ‎你忘记古龙种有多么危险了吗？

translation.en: You're walking to your own death, and you're taking this boy with you.
translation.zh:
‎你在自取灭亡
‎甚至还要捎带上这个男孩

translation.en: He's not doing it for himself, and neither are we.
translation.zh: ‎他那样做不是为了自己 我们也不是

translation.en: Or did you forget what it means to be a Hunter?
translation.zh:
‎还是你忘记了
‎成为一个猎人意味着什么？

translation.en: You were one, weren't you?
Not… for a long time.
Oh. What's this?
There's been a change of plans, everyone. We're not leaving.
translation.zh: ‎计划有变 各位 我们不走了

translation.en: We're gonna stay and defend our homes.
translation.zh: ‎我们要留下来 守护我们的家园

translation.en: -And I've brought us some help. -Wait, what?
translation.zh: ‎我还给大家找来了些帮手 ‎等等 什么？

translation.en: [Julius] There's a natural pinch point just outside the village.
translation.zh: ‎在村子外面就有一个天然的夹点

translation.en: If we can guide it right into that spot, we can set a trap for it.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们能把它引入那里
‎我们就可以在那儿设置陷阱

translation.en: It's a one-of-a-kind Nerscylla stinger.
translation.zh: ‎这是独一无二的影蜘蛛毒刺

translation.en: All kinds of uses.
-Sewing, walking stick-- Ow! -[stinger pierces]
…tranquilizer.
-[Ebbi] And this? -I scouted as far as I could get.
translation.zh:
‎-这个呢？
‎-我追寻到我可以到的最远地方

translation.en: -[Mae] She's a tough one. -Tracks all over.
Everything for 100 miles
has been stirred up by the Lunastra's migration.
It may work to our advantage.
There are some things we need that we can only get from monsters.
translation.zh:
‎有些我们需要的东西
‎只能从怪物那里得到

translation.en: Oh brother.
-[monster growls] -[Nadia] Here it comes!
-[yelps] Where are you guys? -[Aiden] Nox! Nox! Nox!
What are you doin' over there?
Nadia, now.
[Aiden] This way! Hurry!
[Aiden] No, Nox!
-Gotcha, buddy. -[Congalala groans]
Nice shot.
Mae, we're up.
Julius! Look out! Yellow Mushroom!
[Aiden] All right!
-[Congalala belches] -[Julius grunts] Look out.
-Whoa! -Yellow Mushrooms cause paralysis.
Set the trap.
[Aiden] Okay.
-Now! -[Aiden grunts]
Yes!
[grunts] All right!
[Nadia sighs] Just like you drew it up.
[panting] Well done, everyone. That's what teamwork looks like.
translation.zh: ‎干得好 各位 这才是合作的样子

translation.en: Nice deployment on that trap, Aiden.
Thanks. I didn't even need those extra anchors you gave me.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 我甚至没用到
‎你额外给我的那些锚

translation.en: -You didn't anchor it? -[groans] Come on.
Julius, it smells something coming.
translation.zh: ‎朱利乌斯 闻起来好像有什么要来了

translation.en: Everyone, retreat.
No! We can't just let him get away.
Aiden, now's not the time.
Julius, let me fix this.
translation.zh: ‎朱利乌斯 让我来解决这个

translation.en: -Nox, get that Yellow Mushroom! -What?
translation.zh:
‎-诺克斯 去拿那个麻痹菇！
‎-什么？

translation.en: Are you crazy?
[Aiden] We can use it to paralyze the Congalala.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以用它麻痹桃毛兽王

translation.en: Aiden, disengage!
[groans] Stubborn kid.
Oh sh--
Nox! You good, buddy?
Oh no.
That can't be good. Julius!
Oh no.
[Julius] Look out!
There's a big monster in front of me.
[Nadia] Julius, stay down!
Gotcha. [straining]
[Nadia] Move it!
Since when did pickles grow teeth?
-Freaking Deviljho! -[slurring] Deviljho?
Hey, that's got a Dragon Element.
We could totally use that for the Dragonator.
translation.zh: ‎我们完全可以使用击龙枪对付它

translation.en: [groans, laughs] It is on, dragon breath!
-[Aiden] No! -Deviljho?
-That's a Deviljho! -Yeah. Welcome back to reality.
translation.zh:
‎-那是只恐暴龙
‎-是的 欢迎回到现实

translation.en: -Julius. -Go!
[Nadia] Oh no!
Mae, we can use the mushroom to paralyze the Jho.
translation.zh: ‎梅 我们可以用麻痹菇来麻痹恐暴龙

translation.en: Got it.
-[Julius] Get out of here! -[groans] We're a team!
Paisley, go!
[panting] Got it.
-[Deviljho roars] -[Aiden] Watch out!
[Nadia] Got ya!
-[grunts] -Watch out!
-[Aiden exclaims] Whoa! Yes! -[heroic orchestral music playing]
Everyone all right?
Whoo! Did you see that? Did you see what we just did?
translation.zh:
‎你们看到了吗？
‎看到我们刚才做了什么吗？

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
I pulled off that sweet block you showed me.
translation.zh: ‎我甚至使出了你教我的防御动作

translation.en: Your recklessness almost got us all killed.
translation.zh: ‎你的鲁莽差点害死我们所有人

translation.en: We would've been safe when that Deviljho appeared
translation.zh:
‎当恐暴龙出现的时候
‎如果你听我的话

translation.en: if you had just listened to me.
When I command you to retreat, you do so.
translation.zh: ‎当我命令你撤退的时候 你就要照做

translation.en: No hesitation!
I was wrong about you.
For all of your talk of protecting your village,
the only thing that you care about is getting your pat on the back.
translation.zh: ‎你唯一在乎的事情就是得到认可

translation.en: [Nadia] Don't you think you're being a--
translation.zh: ‎朱利乌斯 你不觉得你有一点…

translation.en: No, Nadia. I know what I'm seeing.
translation.zh: ‎不 纳迪亚 我知道我看见了什么

translation.en: This is not a team that I can lead. This was always a fool's errand anyway.
translation.zh:
‎这不是我可以领导的团队
‎反正这任务本来就是不可能成功的

translation.en: Tell everyone to pack up.
Do you think being slightly chewed is gonna hurt the market value?
translation.zh:
‎你们觉不觉得如果稍微咬一口
‎会损害市场价值？

translation.en: [Aiden] I really thought I was improving. Now look at things.
translation.zh: ‎我真的以为我在进步 ‎但是 看看现在

translation.en: Hey, it's not your fault.
No, I messed up again,
just like getting myself cornered by that Velocidrome.
translation.zh:
‎就像我被蓝速龙王
‎逼得走投无路的那次一样

translation.en: [Mae] And ruining my Nerscylla research.
And blowing the Congalala trap.
translation.zh: ‎还没有把桃毛兽王的陷阱做好

translation.en: Oh, and don't forget,
almost getting us trampled, fried, and devoured by a Deviljho.
translation.zh:
‎差点让我们被恐暴龙
‎踩踏、蹂躏、吞噬

translation.en: No big deal.
I'm startin' to think I'm not cut out to be a Hunter.
translation.zh:
‎我开始觉得自己
‎可能不适合当一个猎人

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh! And following the fake tracks I made. Yeah, don't forget that one.
translation.zh: ‎别忘了 你还追踪了我制造的假足迹

translation.en: Yeah. I'm sorry for that day.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我对那天感到抱歉

translation.en: For trying to hit you with a hammer, I mean.
I'm glad I missed.
[Nox] So am I, kid. So am I.
translation.zh: ‎我也是 小子 我也是

translation.en: -[Burl] Oh, Aiden! -[man 1] It's Aiden!
-[Burl] Everyone all right? -[Nox] Thank you, thank you.
Heroes, coming through.
-The heroes have returned. -[man 2] Hey, Aiden!
[Nox] Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Boy, are we hungry.
Do you remember our first hunt?
translation.zh: ‎你还记得我们第一次捕猎吗？

translation.en: Gypceros, wasn't it?
It was the first time you hunted with a Gunner.
translation.zh: ‎那是你第一次和一个枪手一起捕猎

translation.en: You spent half the fight looking over your shoulder,
translation.zh: ‎你花了战斗的一半时间 小心翼翼地

translation.en: trying to make sure you weren't in the way.
So, when the thing flashed its crystal to blind us--
translation.zh:
‎当水晶翼龙亮出它的水晶
‎让我们看不见的时候…

translation.en: Ah, I saw spots for weeks.
translation.zh: ‎我眼里出现了好几个星期的光斑

translation.en: [chuckles] Not exactly the smoothest start for Master Kambei's prodigal student.
translation.zh:
‎对于坎贝大师最潇洒的学生来说
‎这并不是最顺利的开始

translation.en: Why did you follow me, Nadia?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么跟着我 纳迪亚？

translation.en: Aiden made a mistake. He's young.
translation.zh: ‎艾登犯了个错误 但他还小

translation.en: His impulsiveness is a problem.
Says the guy who once charged into a Rajang's mating grounds unarmed.
translation.zh:
‎那个曾经手无寸铁地冲进
‎牛狮怪物交配场里的人 还说别人

translation.en: That's exactly what worries me.
Says the guy who risked his friend… his mentor's life.
translation.zh:
‎是让自己的朋友、自己的师傅
‎陷入危险境地的那个人 才会这样说

translation.en: That was not your fault.
We had enough on our hands with the Rathian.
translation.zh: ‎我们有足够的能力去对付火龙

translation.en: Having a Kushala Daora appear right in the middle of it
translation.zh: ‎让库沙拉古龙出现在正中间

translation.en: was a one-in-a-million chance.
Nah, it wasn't that.
I made mistakes. The master had to come in and save me.
translation.zh: ‎我犯了错误 师傅不得不进来救我

translation.en: We were fighting an Elder Dragon.
I did it to impress the master.
translation.zh: ‎我是为了给师傅留下深刻印象

translation.en: [scoffs] It wasn't easy training with you.
You were Master Kambei's favorite.
translation.zh: ‎你是坎贝大师最得意的门徒

translation.en: He saw something important in you.
translation.zh: ‎他看到了你身上的重要特质

translation.en: I saw it too, with the Deviljho.
translation.zh: ‎对抗恐暴龙这次 我也看到了

translation.en: We can't do this without you.
-I'm not that person anymore. -[Nadia] You are.
translation.zh:
‎-我已经不是之前的那个我了
‎-你是

translation.en: That's why I followed you.
Take my weapons.
Just, please stay and lead the others.
translation.zh: ‎拜托你留下来 带领其他人

translation.en: Protect Timben.
I acted like a fool.
The people here counted on me, and I let them down.
translation.zh:
‎这儿的人们都指望着我
‎我却让他们失望了

translation.en: I know you won't lead a team with me on it.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你不会带领一个有我的团队

translation.en: We will protect Timben…
together.
[Ravi] Hunters!
You said you needed a smith?
[Ravi] I built it to your design.
Congalala stomach should work fine for the steam housing.
translation.zh:
‎桃毛兽王的肚子应该是
‎很合适的蒸汽房

translation.en: Deviljho bones for the bow.
Never forged anything like this. Can't promise it'll work.
translation.zh:
‎从来没有建造过这样的东西
‎我不能保证它一定能用

translation.en: If you're all finished, the village has prepared something special.
translation.zh: ‎如果你们结束了 ‎村庄为你们准备了些特别的东西

translation.en: You must eat.
What?
To Timben's protectors.
-Good hunting! -[Nox] Enough, already. Let's eat.
translation.zh:
‎-捕猎加油！
‎-好了 准备好了 开始吃吧

translation.en: [Aiden] That journal of yours is something.
I think I learned more flipping through it
translation.zh: ‎我想我在翻阅的时候学到的知识

translation.en: than the rest of my time trying to be a Hunter.
translation.zh:
‎比我自己
‎试图成为猎人的其他时间都要多

translation.en: When I was about Ebbi's age, my parents made me write down everything.
translation.zh:
‎当我跟埃比一样大的时候
‎我的父母让我把一切都写下来

translation.en: Needleberries, Flashbugs.
They were researchers. Sticklers for accurate notes.
translation.zh:
‎他们都是研究人员
‎坚持要求准确的笔记

translation.en: I hated it.
So, I got my Guild license
and accepted a quest that would send me out into the world.
translation.zh:
‎接受了一个
‎可以把我送到这个世界的任务

translation.en: Gone for two full years.
Figures.
I'm about to see an Elder Dragon, and suddenly, I'd give just about anything
translation.zh:
‎我就要见到古龙种了
‎突然 我愿意付出一切

translation.en: to be back sketching bugs and berries with them all over again.
"Zamite" be something wrong with you.
[chuckles] How come you always do that? Make puns out of monster names.
translation.zh:
‎你为什么总是那样做？
‎用怪物的名字说双关语

translation.en: The village I used to live in was destroyed when I was seven,
translation.zh: ‎我过去居住的村庄 在我七岁的时候

translation.en: overrun by monsters.
-[gentle music playing] -I lost my parents.
I spent a long time after that being scared.
translation.zh: ‎之后很长一段时间 我都很害怕怪物

translation.en: Eventually…
I just got tired of it.
I figured, if I learned about monsters and made jokes out of their names,
translation.zh:
‎我发现 如果我了解了怪物
‎用它们的名字开玩笑

translation.en: they didn't seem as scary.
Hmm. I'd say, "Veloci-diculous."
When I was in Val Habar some years ago,
translation.zh: ‎几年前我在巴尔巴雷的时候

translation.en: I remember rumors of a rogue Hunter.
translation.zh: ‎我记得有一个关于无赖猎人的流言

translation.en: They say he turned his back on the Guild's philosophy.
translation.zh: ‎他们说 无赖猎人背叛了公会的原则

translation.en: Started hunting for sport,
taking trophies, and selling weapons to fund his habit.
translation.zh:
‎拿战利品
‎卖武器来给他的爱好提供经济支持

translation.en: You came to me.
If you have something you want to say to me, say it.
translation.zh: ‎有什么想对我说的 就直接说吧

translation.en: A Hunter can easily lose his way in battle.
Especially alone. When we go out there--
translation.zh:
‎尤其是孤身一人的时候
‎当我们结束这里的…

translation.en: I don't need a sermon from a Hunter willing to risk our lives
translation.zh: ‎我不需要一个准备让我们冒生命危险

translation.en: to redeem himself from past mistakes.
translation.zh:
‎来为自己过去错误赎罪的猎人
‎对我说教

translation.en: Past mistakes have a remarkable way of taking us down.
translation.zh: ‎过去的错误很容易把我们打败

translation.en: Well, maybe tomorrow will be a chance
for all of us to exorcise some very old monsters.
translation.zh:
‎通过战斗
‎我们可以从悔恨中救赎自己

translation.en: -[woman] Watch out! -[monster roars]
-[Mae gasps] -[Nadia] Move it.
Come on. I'm not finished eating.
-[Nadia] Everything's ready. -Time to kick some Lun-as-tra.
translation.zh:
‎-一切准备就绪
‎-是时候把炎妃龙打飞了

translation.en: -Really? -[laughs] I actually liked that one.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-我觉得这句还挺好笑

translation.en: Not the time.
Weapons out.
Whoa. She's huge.
-[Nadia] Cover your ears! -[Lunastra roars]
-[Nox] I'm out. -Nadia.
-See if you can draw it off. -Got it.
translation.zh:
‎-看看你能不能把它引过去
‎-明白

translation.en: [Nadia] Over here, girl! This way!
She's not going for it.
[Nox] It's, uh, coming back this way!
Nox, go.
-[Lunastra growling] -Hurry.
Oh! That's a lot of rocks. How did that not work?
translation.zh: ‎有好多石块啊 但为什么没有用呢？

translation.en: [Julius] It's not going to leave the valley unless we make it.
translation.zh:
‎除非我们成功
‎否则它不会离开山谷的

translation.en: -[Aiden] And now it flies? -It'll burn the village down from the air.
translation.zh:
‎-现在它飞起来了？
‎-它会从上面烧毁这个村庄的

translation.en: -Ground it! -[Nadia] Coming in!
[Aiden] Oh no, no, no, no!
No!
My brand-new shield!
-Come on! -Look at this thing. It took me six hours.
translation.zh:
‎-快来！
‎-看看这个 花了我六个小时才完成

translation.en: Forget about it! It was terrible anyway.
[Mae grunts] You're a lot stronger than I imagined.
-[Ravi] Come on! -[blade clangs]
We're going to draw it into position.
Aiden, showtime.
Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up.
It's time for plan Dragonator!
It knows!
-The jig is up! -Hit it!
-[Ravi] It didn't work! -The fire damaged it.
[Julius] Use the snare traps. Hold it in position.
translation.zh: ‎用普通陷阱 让它待在那里别动

translation.en: The firing mechanism is busted!
[Mae] Stop the leak in the compressor, let it pressurize.
translation.zh:
‎必须堵住蒸汽压缩机的破损 ‎让它加压 然后你需要
‎手动触发击龙枪

translation.en: Then you'll have to trigger the Dragonator manually.
translation.zh:
‎让它加压 然后你需要
‎手动触发击龙枪

translation.en: [Julius] See if you can fix it.
[Mae] Hold on.
We can't hold this all day.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能一直这样持续下去

translation.en: [Aiden straining] Almost have it.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能一直这样持续下去 ‎马上就行了

translation.en: You're welcome!
-[ropes straining] -[Ravi groans] I'm losing it.
Got it!
[Ravi] I've got you!
-[Mae] Ravi, get out of there. -Get it from this end.
translation.zh:
‎-拉维 快离开那里
‎-从这边抓住它

translation.en: It's jammed. Hold on!
-Do it! -Ravi, no!
-No! [gasps] -[Dragonator creaks]
[man 1] They did it!
translation.zh: ‎他们成功了！他们杀死了炎妃龙！

translation.en: -They slayed the Lunastra! -[man 2] I knew they could!
translation.zh:
‎他们成功了！他们杀死了炎妃龙！ ‎-我就知道他们能行！
‎-好！

translation.en: -[man 3] Yes! -[Burl] Everyone, put out the fires.
translation.zh:
‎-我就知道他们能行！
‎-好！ ‎各位 先去扑灭火

translation.en: [sighs] We did it.
Everyone okay?
-Ravi's dead. -[Mae] Oh.
-Oh no. -[Lunastra snarls]
That's not good.
We had one shot with the Dragonator. What do we do now?
translation.zh:
‎我们的击龙枪只能开一枪
‎我们现在怎么办？

translation.en: There's nothing left to do but attack.
translation.zh: ‎除了攻击 我们别无选择

translation.en: Give it everything we've got.
It cannot reach the village.
Here. Fight with this.
-[Julius] Hmm. -[Aiden] Wait.
Dual Blades. They work separately,
but always together.
-[Nadia] Hey, what the--? -Aiden, what are you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-喂 怎么…？
‎-艾登 你在做什么？

translation.en: I have a plan.
Julius, you have to trust me. I need time.
translation.zh: ‎朱利乌斯 你要相信我 我需要时间

translation.en: You'll have it. What are you going to do?
Restore balance.
Did Aiden just run away with all of my ammunition?
translation.zh:
‎艾登刚刚是
‎带着我所有的弹药跑走了吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He says he needs some time.
translation.zh: ‎是的 他说他需要些时间

translation.en: No problem. Ideas how to do that?
translation.zh: ‎没问题 说说怎么争取时间？

translation.en: -[woman] Watch out! -[Aiden] Nox!
Get everyone out of the village!
translation.zh: ‎我需要你让所有人离开村子！

translation.en: Oh man. It's time for plan panic.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 看来是时候
‎使用惊慌失措策略了

translation.en: [Julius] Fall back. Use the buildings for cover.
translation.zh: ‎退后 用建筑物进行掩护

translation.en: Julius, the villagers.
Go to them.
-I'm out. [grunts] -[Bowgun clicks]
Please work. Please work. Please work. Please work.
Please work. Please work. Please work.
[Mae] Go for its essence.
-[woman] The fire's spreading. -[Burl] More buckets!
translation.zh:
‎-小心！火势在蔓延
‎-我们需要更多水！

translation.en: -[woman] Hurry. We gotta get outta here. -I'm not leaving.
translation.zh:
‎-快 我们得赶快离开这里
‎-我才不走

translation.en: -You have to get out of here. Now. -Here.
translation.zh:
‎-你必须现在就离开这里 快
‎-给你

translation.en: -Oh no, Ebbi. You have to go. -[Ebbi] But I… I'm helping.
translation.zh: ‎不 埃比 你必须快点离开 ‎但我在帮忙

translation.en: Paisley.
Here we go.
[Mae] Take her.
-No! Stop! -[dramatic music resumes playing]
-Mae. -[Nadia] Oh no.
-[Lunastra snarls] -[Julius] No!
[Nadia] It's dander. It'll ignite the whole village.
translation.zh: ‎是蓝色火焰 这会烧毁整个村子

translation.en: Go! Go! Run!
[Nadia] Get out!
[man] No!
-[Burl] The Gargwa coops! -[villagers screaming]
[Aiden groans] Son of a…
Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark.
Yes!
Ha-ha! Plan boomerang saves the day.
What was Aiden's idea again?
translation.zh: ‎艾登的策略到底是什么来着？

translation.en: Go!
Watch out!
[Daazel] Your sacrifice will never be forgotten.
Because of you, the balance of nature
can be brought back to this village.
Thank you.
There is no blame.
It was their choice.
They followed you into an unwinnable battle.
translation.zh:
‎他们跟着你展开了一场
‎没有胜算的战斗

translation.en: To treat it as anything less would diminish what they gave. And why.
translation.zh:
‎如果把这当做失去了什么 那么就会
‎弱化他们所付出的东西以及意义

translation.en: No. It wasn't me they followed.
They followed something larger, a balance each of us hope to find.
translation.zh:
‎他们追随的是一个更大的目标
‎一个我们每个人都希望找到的平衡

translation.en: -[Nox sniffles] -Here. This is Mae's journal.
You keep it. It has instructions to make that Rathalos antidote in it.
translation.zh:
‎你来保管它
‎里面有写如何制作火龙解药

translation.en: I made my own journal to start my own path…
translation.zh: ‎我要写自己的日记 ‎来开创我自己的路…

translation.en: just like Mae.
Timben will be in good hands with you here to protect it.
translation.zh: ‎你在这里 汀本会被守护得很好

translation.en: Hold up! Wait! [panting]
[exhales] Where will you go next?
Dundorma.
The Guild will need to know what happened here.
translation.zh: ‎公会想要知道这里发生了什么

translation.en: I want to come with you.
There's a bigger picture out there, beyond me, beyond Timben.
translation.zh:
‎在我之外 在汀本之外
‎还有一片更大的天地

translation.en: You taught me that the night we first saw the Lunastra.
translation.zh:
‎你在我们第一次
‎看见炎妃龙的那天晚上教给我的

translation.en: There are bigger threats out there.
If I'm gonna face them, I need to become an Ace Hunter.
translation.zh:
‎如果我想要面对
‎我就需要成为首席猎人

translation.en: That's a good "hmm." I've known him a long time.
translation.zh: ‎这个“嗯”表示可以 我认识他很久了

translation.en: And if I am translating correctly, that means,
translation.zh: ‎如果我理解没错的话 他的意思是 ‎“好吧 艾登 你真的进步了”

translation.en: [imitating Julius] "Why, Aiden, you've come such a long way."
translation.zh: ‎“好吧 艾登 你真的进步了”

translation.en: "I would be thrilled to take you on as my cadet."
translation.zh: ‎“我会很开心让你能成为我的学生”

translation.en: -[Julius grunts] -[Aiden] That's "ama-Zinogre"!
[Aiden] Hey, some people like my puns. Right, Nadia?
translation.zh:
‎喂 还是有人喜欢我的双关段子的
‎对吧 纳迪亚？

translation.en: [Nadia] That one was bad.
That was pretty fantastic.
Yeah, like that story about you taking on the Zamtrios.
translation.zh:
‎是的 就像你瞎编的那个
‎解决变形冰鲨的故事一样

translation.en: Hey, that really happened, okay? I came under it. I swept, all right?
translation.zh:
‎喂 那是真的 好吗？我真的解决了它
‎我完全把它踩在脚下 好吗？

translation.en: This wasn't one of those stories,
was it?
Read this.
Wow. It's Mae's last entry to her parents.
translation.zh: ‎这是梅写给父母的最后一条

translation.en: [Mae] I have enjoyed every moment of my journey.
translation.zh: ‎我享受了旅程中的每一分每一秒

translation.en: Father and Mother, you have taught me well.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸妈妈 你们把我教育得很好

translation.en: I think I understand now why this world needs a Guild
translation.zh:
‎我想我现在明白了
‎为什么世界需要公会

translation.en: and people like you to teach them how to live in harmony.
translation.zh:
‎和像你们一样的人
‎来教导他们如何和谐共存

translation.en: Tonight, I joined a team of Hunters.
translation.zh: ‎今晚 我加入了一个猎人团队

translation.en: The mission we are going on is truly dangerous.
translation.zh: ‎我们要解决的任务十分危险

translation.en: I fear it may be my last,
translation.zh:
‎我有点怕 因为这可能
‎是我的最后任务

translation.en: but interestingly, I'm not afraid.
translation.zh: ‎但有趣的是 我并不害怕

translation.en: For these Hunters I fight with are intelligent, caring, courageous,
translation.zh:
‎因为和我并肩作战的这些猎人
‎他们聪明、体贴、勇敢

translation.en: and they brighten my world.
My heart is filled with hope.
